<ApiMember kind="function" name="lv_image_header_cache_init" file="misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h" line={36} url="https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl/blob/master/src/misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h#L36">

### lv_image_header_cache_init

Initialize image header cache.

```c
lv_result_t lv_image_header_cache_init(uint32_t count)
```

<span className="sr-only">Parameters</span>

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| `count` | <ApiLink name="uint32_t" /> | initial size of the cache in count of image headers. |

**Returns:** <ApiLink name="lv_result_t" /> — LV_RESULT_OK: initialization succeeded, LV_RESULT_INVALID: failed.


</ApiMember>

<ApiMember kind="function" name="lv_image_header_cache_resize" file="misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h" line={44} url="https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl/blob/master/src/misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h#L44">

### lv_image_header_cache_resize

Resize image header cache. If set to 0, the cache is disabled.

```c
void lv_image_header_cache_resize(uint32_t count, bool evict_now)
```

<span className="sr-only">Parameters</span>

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| `count` | <ApiLink name="uint32_t" /> | new max count of cached image headers. |
| `evict_now` | <ApiLink name="bool" /> | true: evict the image headers should be removed by the eviction policy, false: wait for the next cache cleanup. |


</ApiMember>

<ApiMember kind="function" name="lv_image_header_cache_drop" file="misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h" line={51} url="https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl/blob/master/src/misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h#L51">

### lv_image_header_cache_drop

Invalidate image header cache. Use NULL to invalidate all image headers. It's also automatically called when an image is invalidated.

```c
void lv_image_header_cache_drop(const void *src)
```

<span className="sr-only">Parameters</span>

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| `src` | `const void *` | pointer to an image source. |


</ApiMember>

<ApiMember kind="function" name="lv_image_header_cache_is_enabled" file="misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h" line={57} url="https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl/blob/master/src/misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h#L57">

### lv_image_header_cache_is_enabled

Return true if the image header cache is enabled.

```c
bool lv_image_header_cache_is_enabled(void)
```

**Returns:** <ApiLink name="bool" /> — true: enabled, false: disabled.


</ApiMember>

<ApiMember kind="function" name="lv_image_header_cache_iter_create" file="misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h" line={63} url="https://github.com/lvgl/lvgl/blob/master/src/misc/cache/instance/lv_image_header_cache.h#L63">

### lv_image_header_cache_iter_create

Create an iterator to iterate over the image header cache.

```c
lv_iter_t * lv_image_header_cache_iter_create(void)
```

**Returns:** <ApiLink name="lv_iter_t" display="lv_iter_t *" /> — an iterator to iterate over the image header cache.


</ApiMember>

### lv_image_header_cache_dump

Dump the content of the image header cache in a human-readable format with cache order.

```c
void lv_image_header_cache_dump(void)
```
